ai-patthana10.2:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means pervading the three watches of the night.
ai-patthana10.2:0.3_0: Seeing for the sake of goodness, wholesome things,
ai-patthana10.2:1.1_0: Not unskillful qualities arise or cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.2:1.1_1: Not unskillful qualities arise or cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.2:1.1_2: Knowing the Teaching, or cause, nor by cause,
ai-patthana10.2:2.1_0: Not with the cause or reason, doesn’t give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.2:2.1_1: Not by the Teaching, or for the sake of teaching,, nor for the sake of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.2:2.1_2: Not with the cause or condition, nor are unskillful things.
ai-patthana10.2:3.1_0: Not cause or reason, it doesn’t give rise to cause or reason. ...
ai-patthana10.2:4.1_0: Neither have no cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.2:5.1_0: Not for the sake of an skilled in profit and not for the sake of a skillful, nor for the sake of a cause.
ai-patthana10.2:5.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana10.2:6.1_3: that’s not the fifteenth day sabbath.
ai-patthana10.2:8.1_0: Not with the cause or reason, without a cause,
ai-patthana10.2:10.1_0: Neither have no cause or condition.
ai-patthana10.2:11.1_0: Not with the cause or reason,
ai-patthana10.2:12.1_0: Not for the sake of a unskillful and not for the sake of skillful, nor for the sake of the skillful, or for the sake of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.2:12.1_1: This is the section in brief.
